alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:49PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dale and central Henry Counties through 415 PM CST... At 349 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Texasville, or 8 miles northwest of Abbeville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Shorterville, Bells Crossroads, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Edwin, Hardwickburg, Otho, Hayes, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Roberts Crossroads, Snells Crossroads, Barefield Crossroads, Murphy Station, Graball, Screamer, Coates, Clopton, Thomas Mill Creek and Bertha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
